entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:38 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
